description: PWGSC, on behalf of Transport Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) to obtain the services of a Contractor in order to perform the renovation of the Garage in Blanc-Sablon, QC. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.",
full_summary:
**Project Tender Announcement**
====================================

**Government Tender Title:**
Renovation of the Garage at the Blanc-Sablon Airport, QC

**Tender Reference Number:**
WS4580457572-Doc4580498390

**Publication Date:**
May 13, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:**
June 25, 2024, at 2:00 PM (14:00) EST

**Modification Details**
--------------------

*   Amendment Number: 5
*   Amendment Date: June 20, 2024

**Project Overview:**
-------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting proposals from qualified contractors to perform the renovation of the garage at the Blanc-Sablon Airport, QC. This project falls under the category of automotive garage and service station construction services (UNSPSC: 72121300).

**Project Details:**
-------------------

*   Project Category: Construction, Infrastructure
*   Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Regions of Opportunity: Quebec (except NCR)
*   Contracting Entity: PSPC
*   End-User Entities: PSPC

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

Jessie Jutras
Department of Public Works and Government Services
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, 
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada,
jitrasjc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Information:**
-------------------------

Please refer to the solicitation documents and the public notice on the Ariba Discovery platform for further details on this project.
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19683009](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19683009)

All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation. This notice is provided for information and background purposes only. Please note that the Eastern Time Zone (EST) is in effect for the tender closing date. The notice is subject to update if any changes occur to the project details. Plan thoroughly and investigate the proposal submission process to avoid any last-minute issues. Contractors who respond to this tender may be required to submit their bid within the allocated time frame. As requirements and timelines change periodically, evaluate the effort necessary to ensure successful application to the government tender.
